DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess effect glucose different type breakfast metabolic neurofunctional response healthy individual . Twelve healthy subject , stable diet , randomized-crossover fashion , receive either 50 g glucose load ( control ) one breakfast : B1 : milk ( 125ml ) cereal ( 30g ) ; B2 : milk ( 220ml ) , apple ( 200g ) cream chocolate fill sponge cake ( 30g ) ; B3 : milk ( 125ml ) , bread ( 50g ) , apple ( 150g ) hazelnut cream chocolate ( 15g ) . Prior upon completion tolerance test , EEG perform measure frontal P300-evoked potential .
